description: Explore how blockchain technology is transforming digital identity management by providing decentralized, secure, and interoperable solutions. This article delves into the challenges and real-world applications, from self-sovereign identities to healthcare and voting systems.
keywords: blockchain, identity management, digital identity, decentralization, privacy, security, interoperability, self-sovereign identity, financial services, healthcare, voting systems, scalability, GDPR, user adoption
title: Blockchain and Identity Management: Transforming Digital Identity in the Digital Age
